about_the_game:
There Is No Escape (TINE) Is a 2D Puzzle-platformer built in Clickteam Fusion 2.5.

STORY

The year is 2578, you have been awoken 553 years after your original construction. You play as Platform Bot. A small green square robot built for... well... Platforming!

You have been commissioned for Season 510 of the 'Super Platform Bot' TV show that is broadcasting around the solar system to over 100 billion humans. As you progress further through the platforming track, you start realizing how dangerous this show actually is, and that you don't want to take part anymore.

You start trying to find ways to escape from the platforming track, only to find out the A.I has got you stuck permanently. You will have to play his twisted and dangerous games to finally be able to escape... Or can you?

Dodge past deadly spikes, lasers, enemies, and even turrets, as you try and win Season 510 of the 'Super Platform Bot' TV Show!

FEATURES

  • Retro Platforming - Experience the old platforming mechanics that were common with old flash games! Built for Keyboard and even Controllers!

  • Fully Voiced Story - The evil A.I has been given a voice to taunt, aid, and hinder your performance, Don't let their words get to you.

  • Replayability - Each level has secrets, make sure to explore around, you never know what might affect your ending.

  • And much much more! - Play the game to find out additional exciting things that are featured in this game!

There Is No Escape (TINE) Is a 2D Puzzle-platformer built in Clickteam Fusion 2.5.

STORY

The year is 2578, you have been awoken 553 years after your original construction. You play as Platform Bot. A small green square robot built for... well... Platforming!

You have been commissioned for Season 510 of the 'Super Platform Bot' TV show that is broadcasting around the solar system to over 100 billion humans. As you progress further through the platforming track, you start realizing how dangerous this show actually is, and that you don't want to take part anymore.

You start trying to find ways to escape from the platforming track, only to find out the A.I has got you stuck permanently. You will have to play his twisted and dangerous games to finally be able to escape... Or can you?

Dodge past deadly spikes, lasers, enemies, and even turrets, as you try and win Season 510 of the 'Super Platform Bot' TV Show!

FEATURES

  • Retro Platforming - Experience the old platforming mechanics that were common with old flash games! Built for Keyboard and even Controllers!

  • Fully Voiced Story - The evil A.I has been given a voice to taunt, aid, and hinder your performance, Don't let their words get to you.

  • Replayability - Each level has secrets, make sure to explore around, you never know what might affect your ending.

  • And much much more! - Play the game to find out additional exciting things that are featured in this game!

name: There Is No Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100H or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 960 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 7.1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The year is 2578, you have been awoken 553 years after your original construction. You play as Platform Bot. A small green square robot built for... well... Platforming! Take part in the deadly 'Super Platforming Bot' TV Show's 510th Season, or die trying.
